ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 307
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all, once again.. I was chitterchattering with someone on my server last night, and I finally got to see a Writhing Staff in a trade window to
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all, once again..

I was chitterchattering with someone on my server last night, and I
finally got to see a Writhing Staff in a trade window to investigate.
Nice weapon, but the fellow bard told me that unless you are level 28+,
the spell effect of the Writhing Staff won't work.

Can anyone confirm/deny/poke me ?

Frashii (Longwind?), Bardette of the 21st Sheet
Tarew Marr
Seekers of Lore, http://www.loreseekers.com

----

>help

>silvery
>axe in secondary :).>
>
>Gleeman Merrilin, Bard of the 20th song (.5 bubbles from 21 again, after
